content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully placed on the map during these steps. The agent repeatedly attempted to provide a Lab for supplying Automation Science Packs (with a targeted placement at Position(x=0.5, y=2.5)); however, crafting and placement failed due to inventory and sub-ingredient shortages. Although furnaces were accessed for smelting—an alternative furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron plate production and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper plate production—these operations used pre‐existing game entities rather than newly built structures.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage Errors (get_entities):
 – Avoid supplying unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or incorrect positional parameters. Verify the function’s signature before calling.
• Lab Placement and Inventory Verification:
 – Ensure that the required Lab item is present in inventory before attempting to place it on the map.
• Crafting Chain Failures:
 – Confirm that all sub‐ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) can be produced or are available. Establish a working production chain and verify resource sufficiency prior to initiating Lab crafting.
• Data Handling:
 – When iterating over returned entities (such as existing labs), safeguard against NoneType values by using appropriate fallback logic (for example, defaulting to an empty list).
